mapper.select: select p.id,p.name,p.number,p.createdDate,p.state,c.name as categoryName,c.id as categoryId,p.postage, p.introduction,p.composition,inv.inventory,p.delivery,p.orderNumber from crm_product p left join crm_sku sku on sku.product_id = p.id and sku.deleted = false left join crm_sku_inventory inv on inv.sku_id = sku.id left join crm_category c on c.id = p.categoryId and c.deleted = false where p.deleted = false and p.id = #{id}
select source.sourceUrl,source.type from crm_product_mobileImages pcSource inner join crm_product_source source on source.id = pcSource.source_id where product_id = #{id}
select source.sourceUrl,source.type from crm_product_mobileVideos pcSource inner join crm_product_source source on source.id = pcSource.source_id where product_id = #{id}
select a.key,a.value from crm_product_attach a where product_id = #{id} order by ordernumber
select id as "skuId" from crm_sku where product_id = #{id}
select count(1) from crm_product p where p.categoryid = #{id} and p.deleted='f'

select setting.type,setting.restrictionType,setting.restrictionAmount,setting.price, case when setting.type = 'GIFT' then setting.credit else null end as credit, case when setting.type = 'COMMODITY' then setting.originalPrice else null end as originalPrice, case when setting.type = 'GIFT' then setting.startDate else null end as startDate, case when setting.type = 'GIFT' then setting.endDate else null end as endDate from crm_product_settings setting where product_id = #{id}
select cps.id,cps.enddate,cps.startdate,cps.type,cps.product_id from crm_product_settings cps where cps.type = 'GIFT';
select cps.type,cps.price,cps.restrictiontype,cps.restrictionamount,cps.credit from crm_product_settings cps where product_id = #{productId}
